4-9/Moderate: You and all creatures within 30 feet of you gain vulnerability to thunder damage for 1 minute.
10-20/Nuisance: You gain proficiency on all Intelligence checks for the next hour, if you dont already have it.

1-3/Extreme: You transform into an empty wooden chest for 1 minute, during which time you are considered petrified.
4-9/Moderate: You and all creatures within 30 feet of you gain vulnerability to cold damage for 1 minute.
10-20/Nuisance: The power of your magic is strong! For the next hour, any spell you cast does not require a verbal component.

1-3/Extreme: Gain the antipathy effects of the antipathy/sympathy spell for 3d6 days.
4-9/Moderate: You gain the ability to speak one language of your choice for 1 day.
10-20/Nuisance: You gain 1d6x10 pounds. You gradually return to your original weight over the course of 1 day.

1-3/Extreme: All creatures within 30 feet of you must make a Wisdom saving throw. Any creature immune to magical sleep automatically succeeds on its saving throw. Those that fail fall asleep for 1d6 minutes.
4-9/Moderate: You and all creatures within 30 feet of you gain vulnerability to radiant damage for 1 minute.
10-20/Nuisance: You gain proficiency in all Dexterity checks for the next hour, if you dont already have it.

1-3/Extreme: You are protected from Plants for 1 day. Such creatures cannot attack you or harm you unless they succeed on a Charisma saving throw against your spell save DC.
4-9/Moderate: You are protected from Celestials for 1 hour. Such creatures cannot attack you or harm you unless they succeed a on a Charisma saving throw against your spell save DC.
10-20/Nuisance: Your fingernails and toenails grow to an uncomfortable length. Until you trim them, your Dexterity is reduced by 1 and your speed is reduced by 5 feet, even if youre not wearing shoes.

1-3/Extreme: All your allies within 20 feet of you gain a +2 bonus to their AC for 1 minute.
4-9/Moderate: For the next minute, you are unable to cast any spell that causes damage of any type.
10-20/Nuisance: You gain the effects of the blur spell for 1 minute, which does not require concentration to maintain.

1-3/Extreme: The next time you fall below 0 hit points within the next month, you automatically fail your first death saving throw.
4-9/Moderate: You gain spider climb for 1 minute, and it does not require concentration to maintain.
10-20/Nuisance: For the next hour, you appear to others to be the opposite gender.

1-3/Extreme: You gain two spell slots at your second-highest level for 1 week.
4-9/Moderate: You immediately lose all unspent sorcery points and may not regain them until you have finished a long rest.
10-20/Nuisance: You gain the service of a 2nd-level spiritual weapon for 1 minute.

1-3/Extreme: For the next day, any time you make an ability check, roll 1d6 and add the result.
4-9/Moderate: You and all creatures within 30 feet of you gain vulnerability to poison damage for 1 minute.
10-20/Nuisance: The power of your magic is strong! For the next hour, any spell you cast does not require a somatic component.

1-3/Extreme: Make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. If you fail, you are transformed into a sheep for 1 minute, as if by the polymorph spell.
4-9/Moderate: You gain the ability to speak with animals for 1 day.
10-20/Nuisance: You gain proficiency in all Constitution checks for the next hour, if you dont already have it.

1-3/Extreme: All allies within 30 feet of you gain a -2 penalty to their AC for 1 minute.
4-9/Moderate: All food and drink within 30 feet of you is purified.
10-20/Nuisance: Every inanimate object that isn't being worn or carried within 40 feet of you becomes enshrouded with shadows for 1 minute. Enshrouded objects are considered heavily obscured.

1-3/Extreme: You are protected from Undead for 1 day. Such creatures cannot attack you or harm you unless they succeed on a Charisma saving throw against your spell save DC.
4-9/Moderate: You are protected from Aberrations for 1 hour. Such creatures cannot attack you or harm you unless they succeed on a Charisma savinng throw against your spell save DC.
10-20/Nuisance: Your fingers become sore for 1 hour. During this time, you must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC to cast a spell with a somatic component.

1-3/Extreme: You jump forward in time exactly 1 minute, for 1 minute. From the perspective of everyone else, you cease to exist during that time.
4-9/Moderate: All your clothing and equipment teleports to the nearest open space at least 15 feet from you that you can see.
10-20/Nuisance: You feel extremely nauseated. Make a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC. If you fail, you must spend your next action throwing up.

1-3/Extreme: All spells you cast within the next minute automatically fail.
4-9/Moderate: Your Constitution is decreased by 2 for 1 hour.
10-20/Nuisance: You immediately lose one unspent sorcery point.
